amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $25.5 million and to reduce funding for Fossil Energy by $34 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $25,500,000 and to reduce funding for Fossil Energy by $34,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 248 (Roll no. 198).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 248 (Roll no. 198).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Swalwell (CA).
